system.description:
A standard medical pain killer used to treat wounds. The medicine temporarily suppresses pain signals and accelerates the body's natural healing process.

Due to side effects, each dose after the first provides diminished benefits, and more than 5 doses in a day can lead to serious complications.

ffg-consumables.effectDescription: Heals wounds based on previous painkiller use. First use heals 5 wounds, second use heals 4, third heals 3, fourth heals 2, fifth heals 1, and subsequent uses have no effect.
